footnotes = }} Ajman ( ), also spelt Ujman, is one of the seven emirates of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). It is the smallest emirate by area, covering 260 square kilometres (100 sq mi),. Its capital is Ajman. ==References==
title: Emirate of Ajman
